price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ( ߏ ߡߊ߬ ) ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߒ ߞߊ߬ߙߌ߬ߝߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߤߌߣߊߒߕߋ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߬ ߸ ߣߴߌ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߊߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
